author: dlr
msg: Using a new compat header file, assure that the APR_VERSION_AT_LEAST()
Add new compatibility API (initially for APR).
Include svn_compat.h, and leverage the APR_VERSION_AT_LEAST() macro.
Take us back to r21561, using the APR_VERSION_AT_LEAST() macro.

author: glasser
msg: Fix sample svnsync setup commands to work properly (under bash).
(Basic Setup): Quote heredoc delimiter, so that $3 and $USER
in the script don't get expanded.
